representedOrganization.name: Jerry Beguelin MD and Esther Schulz DO

tr.td: Jerry Beguelin MD and Esther Schulz DO

td.content: s:a male aged 61 ys presents w/ c/o 3 days h/o moderate decreased hearing in the affected ear, moderate pain and discharge in ear, moderate difficulty hearing words during conversation especially in noisy environments and Head/Eyes/Ears/Nose/Throat. he has approx. a 30 pack/year history of smoking he reports having no more than one drink a day o:Height 181 cm, Weight 94.9 kg, Temperature 37 C, Pulse 95, SystolicBP 113, DiastolicBP 75, Respiration 17 a:Hearing Loss p:performed E/M Level 3 (new patient) - Completed, and referred patient to otorhinolaryngology.

content2.Unmatched: he reports having no more than one drink a day

td.content: s:patient c/o 6 weeks h/o moderate decreased hearing in the affected ear, moderate difficulty hearing words during conversation especially in noisy environments and moderate pain and discharge in ear. NKDA. pt is a 61 yr old M taxidermist. o:Height 180 cm, Weight 92.6 kg, Temperature 36.9 C, Pulse 94, SystolicBP 108, DiastolicBP 68, Respiration 15 a:Hearing Loss p:performed E/M Level 2 (new patient) - Completed, and ordered pure tone audiometry.

tr.td: Jerry Beguelin MD and Esther Schulz DO

td.content: s:patient indicates moderate decreased hearing in the affected ear, moderate difficulty hearing words during conversation especially in noisy environments and moderate pain and discharge in ear. he is a 61 yr old male. o:Height 180 cm, Weight 90.9 kg, Temperature 36.7 C, Pulse 80, SystolicBP 102, DiastolicBP 63, Respiration 14 a:Hearing Loss p:performed E/M Level 3 (established patient) - Completed, and prescribed famcyclovir - 500 mg 3 x per day, and ordered pure tone audiometry.
